title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXIX, pt. 1806 - Review And Approval Of Projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXIX, pt. 1806 - Review And Approval Of Projects

State Regulations

General Provisions (§ 1806.1 to 1806.8)

Application Procedure (§ 1806.10 to 1806.18)

Standards for Review and Approval (§ 1806.20 to 1806.25)

Terms and Conditions of Approval (§ 1806.30 to 1806.35)

Registration of Grandfathered Projects (§ 1806.40 to 1806.45)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXIX, pt. 1806

Statutory authority: Susquehanna River Basin Compact, §§ 3.4, 3.5[5], 3.8, 3.10, 15.2, Pub. L. 91-575, 84 stat. 1509
et
seq. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
